post.author: 관리자
post.content:
Revised at 12:30 PM Apr. 17


LPR has two openings for Modia's high speed ticket printer, MTP.  The two positions are product manager and an engineer who could develop a window driver for MTP.  The following is the ad that we ran for product manager's position.  For the engineer we are looking for someone who could develop Active X tool for the MTP and is familiar with American printer software.
__________________________________________________
Positon: Product Manager / Sales Support (Thermal Printers)

Description: Foreign manufacturer of thermal printers (ticket printers, mobile receipt and label printers) is looking for a Toronto-based representative to help with the launch of an established product line into the North American market.

Must Haves: Looking for an individual with industry experience within this marketplace. Specifically individuals with experience with any of the following product lines: Zebra, Monarch, Sato, Datamax, BOCA Systems, Swecoin, STAR Micronics.

Duties: To advise on the positioning of the product, and to give direction to the sales team.

Terms: Contract position which could turn into full-time in future. Also interested in resumes from employed individuals who may want to take on the job on a consulting basis. Available immediately.





contact : 'saewhankim@hanmail.net'

Thanks.
